🔑 I understand the challenges of working remotely:

✅ Communication

It's key and I understand constant communication is vital when working remotely. I use tools like Slack and even my personal line to make sure I and my colleagues are up to date on everything going on.

✅ Organization

Being organized is important to me else everything becomes a mess and that means more work and less progress. That's a big no-no and i've had my fair share of experience so I try to be organized in every task I do.

{/*}

✅ Time Keeping

I value deadlines a

*/}

✅ Project Management

I believe it's important to break down projects into smaller and more attainable steps to achieve a better end product. I try to implement a skeleton struture for most of my projects which helps me oversee progress and motivates me to persist.

✅ Collaboration

I play well with others. Teamwork is very important to me cause it eases the workload and allows for more creativity and everyone gets to add their personal touch.

✅ Development

You could say i'm an all rounded developer. I enjoy working on backend and frontend projects.

✅ Design

While I'm not a graphic designer, I have an eye for good design. I'm comfortable using Photoshop.

✅ Documentation

Documentation ties into organization and I not only document my code but I also apply it to different applications in my everyday life.
